info.title: Secret Maryo Chronicles
info.author: Wiimpathy
info.details:
A port of Secret Maryo Chronicles to the Wii.
  A Jump and Run game like Super Mario World with an advanced Editor.

  HOW TO PLAY :
  
  WIIMOTE
  * B:		Load level
  * 1:		Shoot
  * 2:		Jump
  * -:		Item
  * +:		Level editor
  * Home:	Menu
  * Dpad:   Run/Choose level

  CLASSIC CONTROLLER
  * A:		Jump
  * B:		Jump
  * X:		Shoot
  * Y:		Shoot
  * -:		Item
  * +:		Level editor
  * Home:	Menu
  * ZL:		Load level
  * Dpad:   Run/Choose level

  CREDITS :

  concept :
  Project Leader: Florian Richter ( FluXy )

  Programmers:
  Code of old version Developer: Florian Richter ( FluXy )
  Linux Compatibility: Thomas Huth ( Thothy )
  http://www.secretmaryo.org/

  New additional Code and bonus Developer: HunoPPC
  OS4 port by Hugues Nouvel HunoPPC.
  http://www.clubevolution4.com/HunoPortSDL/
